heading: SS&S 207 8s.
sub_heading: Eyo ninu Oluwa
title: Ẹ yo nin'Oluwa, Ẹyin ọlọkan diduro

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ yo nin'Oluwa,
 Ẹyin ọlọkan diduro,
 At'ẹyin t'a se l'ayanfẹ,
 Mu 'banujẹ kuro l'ọkan yin.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ nin' 
 Oluwa, ẹ yọ. )2ce.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ yọ n'tori Oun l'Oluwa,
 L'ayé ati l'ọrun pẹlu;
 O n j'Ọba nipa asẹ Rẹ,
 O l'agbara lati gbala.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ nin' 
 Oluwa, ẹ yọ. )2ce.

lyrics.lyric:
Nigba ti ogun ba gbona,
 T'ọta ba fẹrẹ sẹgun yin;
 Ogun Jesu ti a ko ri,
 Pọ ju gbogbo ọta yin lọ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ nin' 
 Oluwa, ẹ yọ. )2ce.

lyrics.lyric:
B'ọsan d'oru mọ yin loju,
 T'okunkun rẹ n dẹru ba yin;
 Ẹ ma jẹ k'ọkan yin bajẹ,
 Gbẹkẹle tit'ewu yoo tan.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ nin' 
 Oluwa, ẹ yọ. )2ce.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ yọ nin' Oluwa ẹ yọ,
 Ẹ f'orin didun yin logo;
 Fi duru, fere, at'ohun,
 Kọrin Halleluyah kikan.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ, ẹ yọ nin' 
 Oluwa, ẹ yọ. )2ce.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: E fi ogo ati agbara fun Oluwa.
title: Egbe Kérúbù a de, lati yin Baba; Gbogbo agbayé ẹ wa o,

lyrics.lyric:
Egbe Séráfù a de,lati yin Baba,
 Tewe-tagba ẹ wa o,
 ka jọ yin Baba.

Igun mẹrẹrin ẹ wa, ka lọ yin Baba,
 Kérúbù pẹlu Séráfù,
 se wọn yin Baba.

Tọmọde tagba, ẹ wa fi'yin fun Baba,
 Kérúbù pẹlu Séráfù,
 awa yin Baba.

Jesu Olugbala, a de lati yin Baba,
 Jọwọ se 'ranti Kérúbù,
 pe wa ni Tirẹ.

Jesu Olugbala ko wa, jọwọ ko wa lọ,
 Ọdọ Baba wa loke,
 jọwọ ko wa lọ.

Jesu Olugbala, o se,
 o ko jẹ k'awa gbe,
 Igbekun t'esu di silẹ,
 ko jẹ k'awa gbe.

Ẹyin obinrin, ẹ rọju,
 ẹ rọju ẹ ma bohun bọ,
 Gbogbo ẹni dabi Hannah
 Baba o gbọ tirẹ.

Baba ranti arugbo,to wa ninu wa,
 K'ebi alẹ ma pa wọn,
 jọwọ ranti wọn.

Ẹmi Mimọ wa, jọwọ fi han ni,
 Ọrọ Mimọ Bibeli, j
 ọwọ fi han ni.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: Oluwa oun ni Olorun wa
title: A DUPẸ lọwọ Ọlọrun T'O da wa si d'oni

lyrics.lyric:
A DUPẸ lọwọ Ọlọrun
 T'O da wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o da ẹmi wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Isẹ pọ n'ilu Osogbo,
 T'Ilesa ko ni sọ;
 Ẹgbẹ Ondo ti mura tan,
 Lati gbe Jesu ga.
lyrics.EGBE:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o da ẹmi wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹgbẹ Eko damure yin,
 Lati besu jagun;
 Oko pọn pupọ n'ilu Oke,
 Tani yoo lọ ka?
lyrics.EGBE:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o da ẹmi wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
A ki Baba Aladura,
 O ku afojuba;
 Olori ti jagun fun Jesu,
 O si sẹgun Esu.
lyrics.EGBE:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o da ẹmi wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Orin Halle, Halleluya,
 L'awa y'o kọ l'ọrun;
 Nigba t'a ba r'Olugbala,
 tNi ori itẹ Rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o da ẹmi wa si d'oni;
 T'o jẹ k'ẹmi tun ẹmi ri,
 Ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: Emi o ma fi ibukun fun Oluwa nigba gbogbo, iyin re yo ma wa ni enu mi titi
title: Ẹyin Angẹl to wa l'ọrun, Ẹ fi iyin fun Baba,

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹyin Angẹl to wa l'ọrun,
 Ẹ fi iyin fun Baba;
 Fun’egbe to da silẹ layé,
 Fun igbala ẹmi,
 O yẹ ki inu wa ko dun,
 Ki awa ki o si ma yọ!
 Fun iranti iku Jesu,
 Lori Agbelebu.

Kérúbù ati Séráfù,
 Ẹ fi iyin fun Baba;
 Ti o da Ijọ yi silẹ,
 Pe k'a le ri igbala,
 'Tori na, ẹ jẹ k'a mura,
 Lati sare ije yi,
 Bi a ba foriti d'opin,
 Iye y'o jẹ tiwa.

Gbogbo isẹ wa ti a n se,
 Gbogbo iwa ti a n hu,
 Gbogbo ọrọ wa ti a n sọ,
 Ẹ jẹ k'a ma sọra,
 Nitori Oluwa yoo mu,
 Gbogbo 'sẹ wa si 'dajọ,
 Ati gbogbo ohun 'kọkọ,
 Ire tabi ibi.

Awa ni imọlẹ ayé,
 Lati le okunkun lọ,
 Ilu ta tẹ sori oke,
 A ko le fara sin;
 Awa si ni iyọ ayé,
 Ti a o mu ayé dun,
 Sugbọn b'iyọ ba di obu,
 Bawo ni yoo se dun?

Ọpẹ lo yẹ Olugbala,
 Fun ifẹ to ni si wa;
 Ti o pe wa sinu Ẹgbẹ yi,
 Ọkọ 'gbala 'kẹhin;
 Ogo, ọla at'agbara,
 Ọla nla at'ipa,
 Ni fun Baba, Ọmọ, Ẹmi,
 Mẹtalọkan lailai.

heading: C.M.S 559 H.C.585 P.M.
sub_heading: Mo gbohun nla kan, t'opolopo eniyan l'orun n wi pe, Alleluya.
title: Ẹ gbe ohun ayọ at'iyin ga,Alleluyah!

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ gbe ohun ayọ at'iyin ga,
 Alleluyah!
 Orin ogo Ọba nla l'awọn ti
 A rapada y'o ma kọ:
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Awọn ẹgbẹ akọrin ọrun,
 Wọn a gberin naa yika ọrun,
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Awọn ti ń rin gbẹfẹ kiri ni
 Paradise,
 Awọn ẹni 'bukun ni,
 wọn a ma kọ orin wi pé,
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Awọn 'rawọ ti n tan mọlẹ wọn,
 Ati gbogbo awọn ẹgbẹ irawọ
 da ohun wọn lu wi pé,
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Ẹyin sanmọ t'o n wọ si lọ,
 at'ẹyin ẹfufu,
 Ẹyin ara t'o n san wa,
 ẹyin manamana ti o n kọ mana;
 Ẹ fi ayọ gberin, Alleluya!

Ẹyin omi, at'igbi okun,
 ẹyin ojo, at'otutu,
 Ẹyin ojo dida ra gbogbo,
 Ẹyin igboro at' igbo,
 Ẹ gberin naa, Alleluya!

Ẹyin oniruru ẹyẹ,
 ẹ kọrin iyin Ẹlẹda yin pe,
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Ẹyin ẹranko igbẹ, ẹ d'o hun yin lu,
 Ẹ si kọrin iyin Ẹlẹda wi pé
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Jẹ k'awọn oke k'o bu s'ayọ,
 Alleluya!
 K'awọn pẹtẹlẹ si gberin naa,
 Alleluya!

Ẹyin ọgbun omi kun,
 ẹ kọ wi pé, Alleluya!
 Ẹyin ilẹ gbigbẹ,
 ẹ dahun wi pé, Alleluya

Ọlọrun t'O da ayé ni k'a f'orin yin;
 Alleluya! Alleluya!

Eyi l'orin ti Ọlọrun fẹ, Alleluya!
 Eyi l'orin ti Krist tika larẹ fẹ,
 Alleluya!

Nitori naa, tọkantọkan la'o
 fi kọrin, Alleluya!
 Awọn ọmọde wẹwẹwẹ
 y'o gba orin
 naa kọ wi pé Alleluya!

Ki gbogbo eniyan ki o kọ
 Alleluya si Ọlọrun;
 Alleluya titi ayé,
 Fun Ọmọ oun Ẹmi Mimọ.

Ogo ni f'Ologo Mẹta
 Alleluya! Alleluya!Alleluya!
 .AMIN.

heading: C.M.S 427 H.C.429 8s.4.
sub_heading: Ohun gbogbo odo Re ni o ti wa ati ninu owo Re ni awa ti fi fun O.
title: Oluwa ọrun oun ayé,Wọ n'iyin at'ọpẹ yẹ fun

lyrics.lyric:
Oluwa ọrun oun ayé,
 Wọ n'iyin at'ọpẹ yẹ fun;
 Bawo l'a ba ti fẹ Ọ to?
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

Orun ti ń ran at'afẹfẹ,
 Gbogbo eweko ń sọ'fẹ Rẹ;
 'Wọ l'O ń mu irugbin dara,
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

Fun ara lile wa gbogbo,
 Fun gbogbo ibukun ayé;
 Awa yin Ọ, a si dupẹ,
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

O ko du wa ni ọmọ Rẹ,
 O fi fun ayé ẹsẹ wa;
 O si f'ẹbun gbogbo pẹlu,
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

O fun wa l'Ẹmi Mimọ Rẹ,
 Ẹmi iye at'agbara;
 O rọjo ẹkun 'bukun Rẹ
 Le wa lori.

Fun idariji ẹsẹ wa,
 Ati fun ireti ọrun;
 Ki l'ohun t'a ba fi fun Ọ?
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

Owo, ti a ń na, ofo ni,
 Sugbọn eyi t'a fi fun Ọ;
 O jẹ isura tit'ayé,
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

Ohun t'a bun Ọ Oluwa,
 'Wọ o san le e pada fun wa;
 Layọ l'a o ta Ọ lọrẹ,
 Onibu-ọrẹ.

Ni ọdọ Rẹ l'a ti san wa,
 Ọlọrun Olodumare;
 Jẹ k'a le ba Ọ gbe titi
 Onibu-ọrẹ.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: E ma yin Oluwa
title: A DUPẸ lọwọ Ọlọrun T'O da wa si d'oni

lyrics.lyric:
Ọpe lo yẹ f'Olugbala,
 Iyin fun Mẹtalọkan;
 T'o da wa si d'ọjọ oni,
 A f'ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Mẹtalọkan Ọba Ogo,
 Baba fun wa l'agbara,
 F'awọn asaju n'isẹgun,
 Fun wọn l'ọgbọn at'oye.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Ọbangiji Ọba Ogo,
 Ranti Ẹgbẹ Aladaura;
 Fun wọn l'agbara at'ifẹ
 Ko wọn l'adura t'ọrun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Jehovah-Nissi Ọba wa,
 Saanu f'egbe serafu;
 F'isegun f'egbe Kerubu,
 se wa gege bi t'orun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Awọn ti ko ri'se yoo ri,
 Agan a f'ọwọ s'osun;
 Ọlọmọ ko ni padanu
 Alaisan yoo dide.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Gbọ tiwa Baba wa ọrun,
 Ranti Ẹgbẹ idalẹ;
 Fun wọn l'agbara at'ipa,
 Fun gbogbo wa n'isẹgun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.

lyrics.lyric:
Jehovah Shammah Ọba wa,
 Gba t'o ba d'ọjọ ikẹyin;
 Mu wa d'agbala itura,
 JAH mu wa de'tẹ Ogo.
lyrics.EGBE:
Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Orin ogo la o kọ,
 Kọrin Ogo, Alleluya,
 Kọ Hossanah s'Ọba wa.
 .AMIN.

heading: SS&S 209
sub_heading: Fi ibukun fun Oluwa, iwo okan mi
title: A yin Ọba Ogo, Oun ni Ọlọrun,Ẹ yin fun'sẹ 'yanu ti O se fun wa

lyrics.lyric:
A yin Ọba Ogo, Oun ni Ọlọrun,
 Ẹ yin fun'sẹ 'yanu ti O se fun wa,
 Fun sisọ t'o n sọ wa ni ọjọ gbogbo,
 Fun ọwọ ina ati awọsanma.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹyin Angẹli didan
 fi harpu wura yin,
 Ẹyin Ogo ọrun t'ẹ n ri oju Rẹ,
 Yika gbogbo ayé titi?
 Lai n'isẹ Rẹ yo ma yin
 Fi ibukun f'Oluwa
 iwọ ọkan mi.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ yin fun igbala to fun wa l'ọfẹ,
 Ẹ yin fun Orisun to le wẹ wa mọ;
 Ẹ yin fun ore ati itọju Rẹ,
 Ẹ yin pẹlu pe O n gbọ adura wa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹyin Angẹli didan
 fi harpu wura yin,
 Ẹyin Ogo ọrun t'ẹ n ri oju Rẹ,
 Yika gbogbo ayé titi?
 Lai n'isẹ Rẹ yo ma yin
 Fi ibukun f'Oluwa
 iwọ ọkan mi.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ yin fun idanwo, ti o n ran si wa,
 Lati fi s'okunfa wa s'ọdọ 'ra Rẹ;
 Ẹ yin fun igbagbọ lati ma sẹgun,
 Ẹ yin fun 'leri ilu ọrun rere.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹyin Angẹli didan
 fi harpu wura yin,
 Ẹyin Ogo ọrun t'ẹ n ri oju Rẹ,
 Yika gbogbo ayé titi?
 Lai n'isẹ Rẹ yo ma yin
 Fi ibukun f'Oluwa
 iwọ ọkan mi.
 .AMIN.

heading: t.SS&S 134
sub_heading: E fiyin fun Oluwa
title: Ẹyin Ẹgbẹ Igbala,Jẹ k'a yin Ọba Ogo

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹyin Ẹgbẹ Igbala,
 Jẹ k'a yin Ọba Ogo,
 T'o da wa si di oni,
 T'iparun ko ba wa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Yin Oluwa, (2)
 Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Ẹyin agbayé dide,
 K'a yin Ọba Ogo.

lyrics.lyric:
Onigbagbọ agbayé,
 Imale gbogb' ayé;
 Ati Keferi agbayé,
 Ẹ wa k'a yin Oluwa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Yin Oluwa, (2)
 Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Ẹyin agbayé dide,
 K'a yin Ọba Ogo.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹmi Adaba Ọrun,
 Se'le Rẹ ninu wa;
 'Fun wa l'okun 'lera,
 Lati yin Ọlọrun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Yin Oluwa, (2)
 Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Ẹyin agbayé dide,
 K'a yin Ọba Ogo.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: E fi ope fun Oluwa.
title: Awa dupẹ, awa t'ọpẹ da,T'o ti pa agbara ina ileru

lyrics.lyric:
Awa dupẹ, awa t'ọpẹ da,
 T'o ti pa agbara ina ileru.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Ajẹ, oso at'alawirin, sanpọnna,
 Irun-mọlẹ ti di 'tẹmọlẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Awa ọmọ Ijọ Séráfù,
 Ẹ mura ka si le tẹ esu mọlẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹni t'o ro p'oun ti duro
 K'o sọra ki o ma ba subu lulẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Orin Halleluyah l'a o kọ,
 'Gbati gbogbo idanwo ba kọja lọ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ f'ogo fun Baba wa l'oke,
 Ka si f'ogo f'Ọmọ Rẹ l'ọrun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
K'a f'ogo fun Ẹmi Mimọ,
 Mẹtalọkan si l'ọpẹ yẹ fun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.

lyrics.lyric:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ogo ni fun, Ogo ni fun,
 Ogo ni f'Orukọ Rẹ.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: Fi ilu ati ijo yin
title: Ẹ damure ẹyin Seraf' Ẹ mu harpu yin pẹlu;

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ damure ẹyin Seraf'
 Ẹ mu harpu yin pẹlu;
 Ẹ jẹ ki Kimbali yin dun,
 Lati pade Ọba wa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Loke odo ọna Eden
 Ibugbe mimọ to dara,
 Nibi Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Yin Baba Mimọ logo.

lyrics.lyric:
Fi 'lu ati 'jo yin Baba,
 Baba y'o f'ayọ fun wa;
 Bi awa ba jẹ le gbagbọ,
 Ere pupọ ni fun wa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Loke odo ọna Eden
 Ibugbe mimọ to dara,
 Nibi Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Yin Baba Mimọ logo.

lyrics.lyric:
Baba masai fi 're fun wa,
 Awa Seraf' ayé yi;
 Se wa yẹ fun isin gbogbo,
 Ka gb' ade wa nikẹhin.
lyrics.EGBE:
Loke odo ọna Eden
 Ibugbe mimọ to dara,
 Nibi Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Yin Baba Mimọ logo.

lyrics.lyric:
Baba to gbọ ti Elijah,
 Masai gbọ ti Séráfù;
 Jehovah-Jire Ọba wa,
 Se wa yẹ lọjọ 'kẹhin.
lyrics.EGBE:
Loke odo ọna Eden
 Ibugbe mimọ to dara,
 Nibi Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Yin Baba Mimọ logo.

lyrics.lyric:
A o f'ogo fun Baba wa,
 Fun Ọmọ to da wa si;
 Bi ọdun si ti n yipo lọ,
 Mẹtalọkan la o yin.
lyrics.EGBE:
Loke odo ọna Eden
 Ibugbe mimọ to dara,
 Nibi Kérúbù, Séráfù,
 Yin Baba Mimọ logo.
 .AMIN.

heading: C.M.S 568 H.C.5808.7.8.7.4.7.
sub_heading: Fi ibukun fun Oluwa, iwo okan mi.
title: Ọkan mi yin Ọba ọrun, Mu ọrẹ wa sọdọ Rẹ;

lyrics.lyric:
Ọkan mi yin Ọba ọrun,
 Mu ọrẹ wa sọdọ Rẹ;
 'Wọ ta wosan,ta dariji,
 Tal'a ba ha yin ni Rẹ?
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Yin Ọba Ainipẹkun )2ce

Yin fun anu to ti fihan,
 Lori Ẹgbẹ Séráfù;
 To pa wa mọ titi d'oni,
 To si fun wa n'isẹgun.
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Ologo n'nu otitọ )2ce

Yin fun abo ti o daju,
 To n fun wa lojurere;
 Ninu wahala oun 'danwo,
 Anu Rẹ wa bakan naa,
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Ologo Olotitọ )2ce

Yin fun abo ti o daju,
 Ta n ri n'Ijọ Séráfù
 Ajẹ, Oso, oun Sanpọnna,
 Wọn ko ri wa gbese mọ,
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Ọba Alainipẹkun )2ce

A n gba b'itana eweko,
 T'afẹfẹ n fẹ, t'o si n rọ;
 'Gba ti a n wa, ti a si n ku,
 Ọlọrun wa bakan naa.
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Yin Ọba Alainipẹkun )2ce

Bi baba ni o n tọju wa,
 O si mọ ailera wa;J
 ẹjẹ lo n gbe wa l'apa Rẹ,
 O ń f'ounjẹ iye bọ wa.
 Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa, )
 Anu Rẹ yi ayé ka )2ce

Ogun ọrun, ẹ ba wa yin,
 Baba, Ọmọ, oun Ẹmi;
 Orun, osupa, ẹ wolẹ,
 Ati gbogbo agbayé.
 Ẹ ba wa yin, ẹ ba wa yin)
 Ọlọrun Mẹtalọkan )2ce
 .AMIN.

heading: C.M.S 44 H.C.55 P.M.
sub_heading: Olorun yi, Olorun wa ni lai-lai.
title: A f'ope f'Ọlọrun,L'ọkan ati ohun wa;

lyrics.lyric:
A f'ope f'Ọlọrun,
 L'ọkan ati ohun wa;
 Ẹni n s'ohun 'yanu,
 N'nu Ẹni t'arayé n yọ;
 Gba t'a wa l'ọm'ọwọ,
 Oun na l'o n tọju wa,
 O si nf'ẹbun ifẹ,
 Se 'tọju wa sibẹ.

Ọba Onib'ọrẹ,
 Ma fi wa silẹ lailai;
 Ayọ ti ko l'opin,
 Oun 'bukun y'o jẹ tiwa;
 Pa wa mọ n'nu ore,
 To wa gba 'ba damu,
 Yọ wa ninu ibi,
 Layé ati l'ọrun.

K'a fi iyin oun ọpẹ,
 F'Ọlọrun Baba, Ọmọ;
 At' Ẹmi Mimọ,
 Ti o ga julọ l'ọrun;
 Ọlọrun kan lailai,
 T'ayé at'ọrun mbọ,
 Bẹ lo wa d'isinyi,
 Bẹni y'o wa lailai.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: Gba a gbo.
title: Jesu, mo wa sọdọ rẹ,Jẹ ki n le ma tọ Ọ lẹyin,

lyrics.lyric:
Jesu, mo wa sọdọ rẹ,
 Jẹ ki n le ma tọ Ọ lẹyin,
 Bi 'ni mi gbogbo segbe,
 Ti ero mi gbogbo si soji.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Keferi, Imale, ẹ wa,
 Onigbagbọ, ma kalọ,
 K'a jọ yin Ọlọrun wa,
 K'a le d'ade ni 'kẹhin
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
A dupẹ lọwọ Ọlọrun,
 T'o fi Jesu Kristi fun wa,
 Lati ra arayé pada,
 Lọwọ ẹsẹ at'esu.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹgbe Séráfù damure,
 Ẹgbe Kérúbù kun f'adura,
 Olugbala yoo gba wa la,
 Oluwosan yoo wo wa san.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Ọjọ mbọ t'ayé yoo pin,
 Ẹ sọra ẹyin Mimọ;
 K'ẹni ’waju tẹ siwaju,
 K'ẹni ẹhin ma jafara.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Awọn to sẹgun saju,
 Wọn n wo wa b'a ti n yọ loni,
 Wọn nkan sara si wa wi pé,T
 ẹ siwaju, ma fa s'ẹyin.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Ma siyemeji lọna yii,
 B'o ti wu k'o le fun ọ to;
 Séráfù mase foya,
 Adun y'o kẹhin ayé rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Nigba ti 'pe kẹhin ba dun,
 Jesu y'o ko wa de Kenaani,
 Jẹ ka l'ayọ lọdọ Rẹ,
 Fi wa s'agbala itura.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ f'ogo fun Baba loke,
 Ẹ f'ogo fun Ọmọ pẹlu;
 Ẹ f'ogo fun Ẹmi Mimọ,
 Mẹtalọkan lọpẹ yẹ fun.
lyrics.EGBE:
Ẹ yin logo, ẹyin Mimọ,
 Ẹ f'ọpẹ fun Baba loke,
 Da wa si l'ẹgbẹ Séráfù,
 Ni 'kẹhin gba ọkan wa la.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: E fi ope fun Oluwa.
title: Ẹ je ka jumọ f'ọpẹ f'Ọlọrun,Orin iyin, at'ọpẹ lo yẹ wa

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹ je ka jumọ f'ọpẹ f'Ọlọrun,
 Orin iyin, at'ọpẹ lo yẹ wa,
 Iyanu n'ifẹ Rẹ si gbogbo wa,
 Ẹ kọrin 'yin s'Ọba Olore wa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba

lyrics.lyric:
Ki l'a fi san j'awọn t'iku ti pa?
 Iwọ lo f'ọwọ wọ wa di oni;
 'Wọ lo n sọ wa to
 n gba wa lọw'ewu,
 Ẹ kọrin 'yins'Olutọjuwa.
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba.

lyrics.lyric:
Gbogbo alaye l'O n fun l'Ounjẹ wọn,
 Iwọ lo n pese f'onikaluku,
 Iwọ lo n sikẹ ẹda Rẹ gbogbo,
 Ẹ kọrin 'yin si Onibu-oreọrẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba.

lyrics.lyric:
Ohun wa ko dun to lati kọrin,
 Ẹnu wa ko gboro to fun ọpẹ,
 B'awa n'ẹgbẹrun ahọn nikọkan,
 Wọn kere ju lati gb'ọlaRẹ ga
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba.

lyrics.lyric:
Gbe wa leke 'soro l'ọjọ gbogbo,
 Fun wa l'ayọ at'alafia Rẹ,
 Jẹ k'ari 'bukun gba lọ'le wa,
 K'a ba le wa f'ogo f'orukọ Rẹ.
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba.

lyrics.lyric:
Ẹyin Angẹli l'ọrun wa ba wa gbe,
 Orin iyin at'ọpẹ l'o yẹ wa,
 S'Ọba wa aiku Ọlọla-julọ,
 Ọba wa Jehofa t'o j'Ọba.
lyrics.EGBE:
Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba
 A f'ijo, ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
 Alaye ni o yin Ọ bo ti yẹ,
 Halleluyah! Ogo ni fun Baba.
 .AMIN.

sub_heading: Fi ibukun fun Oluwa iwo okan mi.
title: Gbogbo ẹyin isẹ Oluwa, Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa.

lyrics.lyric:
Gbogbo ẹyin isẹ Oluwa,
 Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹyin Alufa Oluwa,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹyin Woli Oluwa,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in,k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹyin Kérúbù, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹyin Séráfù, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Ẹyin mimọ, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Gbogbo Ẹgbẹ Eko,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Abẹokuta,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Ibadan,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in,k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Ile-Ifẹ,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Ilesa,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Ondo,Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in,k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Agege, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

 Ẹgbẹ 'Jebu-Ode, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

Ẹgbẹ Akitoye, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

Ẹgbẹ Ararọmi, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Ojokoro, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

 Ẹgbẹ Ifọ, ẹ f'ibukun f' Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Onigbongbo, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Fakore, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Yobo, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Onibuku, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

Ẹyin Wasimi, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Afojupa, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,

 Ẹgbẹ Oke-Oluwo, ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Oju Sango, ẹ f' ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Idi-Iroko, ẹ f' ibukun f'Oluwa,
 Ẹgbẹ Tigbo, ẹ f' ibukun f' Oluwa,
 K'ẹ yin in, k'ẹ si ma gbe E ga titi lai.

Ẹgbẹ Abule Iporo, ẹ f'ibukun f' Oluwa,

Ẹgbẹ Abule Dawodu,
 Ẹ f'ibukun f'Oluwa,
